PassiveDesc.Name: Blazing Bat

PassiveDesc.Name: Fervent Rage
PassiveDesc.Desc: Start the reception at Emotion Level 2.

PassiveDesc.Name: Rampaging Flames
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, inflict 1 burn to all characters, including self. Every 3 scenes, increase the burn inflicted by 1 (max 15).

PassiveDesc.Name: Midnight Arrival
PassiveDesc.Desc: Starting with the fifth Scene, gain 1 Protection, Stagger Protection, Haste, and Damage Up each Scene

PassiveDesc.Name: Calm

PassiveDesc.Desc: Every third successful attack inflicts 2 burn

PassiveDesc.Name: Ignited Bat
PassiveDesc.Desc: Inflict 1 Burn on hit. At the start of each Scene, gain 5 burn.

PassiveDesc.Name: Smoldering Insanity
PassiveDesc.Desc: Dice gain +1 Power for every 20 stacks of Burn on self (max 3). If Burn on self reaches 70...

PassiveDesc.Name: Cauterize
PassiveDesc.Desc: Once per reception, when Staggered, recover from Stagger, recover 40 Stagger resist and 20 HP, and gain 20 Burn.

PassiveDesc.Name: Pony Express
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of the Scene, if all allies are alive, gain 1 Haste and 1 Cycle next Scene; if all other allies are dead, inflict 2 Bind on self instead. This passive ability is only active if the Act started with one or more other allies.

PassiveDesc.Name: Special Delivery!
PassiveDesc.Desc: While the character has Cycle, Blunt and Defensive dice gain +1 Power.

PassiveDesc.Name: Same-Day Delivery
PassiveDesc.Desc: If 3 or fewer pages are in-hand at the end of the Scene, gain 1 Haste and Cycle next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Posthaste
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain an additional Speed Die at Emotion Level 2. (Cannot Overlap)

PassiveDesc.Name: Arctic Drift
PassiveDesc.Desc: Offensive dice on the first Combat Page the character uses each Scene gain an additional effect: ‘[On Hit] Inflict 1 Bind to each other next Scene’

PassiveDesc.Name: Steady
PassiveDesc.Desc: Take 2 less damage and Stagger damage from enemies with higher Speed.

PassiveDesc.Name: Vengeance Call
PassiveDesc.Desc: If an ally dies, restore 1 Light and gain a Speed die next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Aurora Workshop Firearm
PassiveDesc.Desc: Ranged Attack Stagger Damage +2

PassiveDesc.Name: Do I Wanna Know?

PassiveDesc.Name: Heightened Emotions II
PassiveDesc.Desc: Start the reception at Emotion Level 2.

PassiveDesc.Name: Inferno Templar
PassiveDesc.Desc: Melee Pierce Dice gain +1 Power and deal +2 damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Inferno Corps
PassiveDesc.Desc: Pierce Dice Power +1; Ranged Pierce dice deal +1 damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Beginnings of Samsara
PassiveDesc.Desc: Untransferable. "Speed Break" becomes accessible, and can be used by spending Samsara. At the start of each Scene, gain Samsara equal to the amount of Haste on self. Upon using a Combo Finisher page, gain Samsara equal to its original Cost.

PassiveDesc.Name: Combo Mastery
PassiveDesc.Desc: Reduce the Cost of Combo Finisher pages by 1.

PassiveDesc.Name: Step Over the River
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon a successful evade, gain 1 Poise.

PassiveDesc.Name: Former Shi Fixer
PassiveDesc.Desc: All dice gain +1 Power if an ally died this Act.

PassiveDesc.Name: Beginnings of Samsara
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon taking a lethal blow, reduce all incoming damage including what activated this passive by 69 for the Scene (Activates once per Act), then if this character is Staggered, fully recover from Stagger next Scene, and fully recover Stagger Resist. At the start of the following Scene, activate Speed Break.

PassiveDesc.Name: Sparkling
PassiveDesc.Desc: Restore 1 additional Light and draw 1 additional page at the start of each Scene.
